title: LifeLock Ultimate Plus Identity Theft Protection, Individual Plan, 1 Year Subscription, Activation Required [Subscription]
description: LifeLock Ultimate Plus identity theft protection provides enhanced identity theft protection beyond financial and credit fraud. We search for falsified court records containing your information to help protect you from arrest for crimes you haven’t committed and monitor for fictitious identities using aliases with your Social Security number. We’ll also alert you of potentially fraudulent credit card activity and provide online access to your annual One-Bureau credit report and score. The credit score provided is a VantageScore 3.0 credit score based on Equifax data. Third parties use many different types of credit scores and are likely to use a different type of credit score to assess your creditworthiness.***
